name: .DASCHEMA File Extension
summary: Learn about .DASCHEMA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Database file created by Data Abstract, a database development software included with the RemObjects SDK; uses XML formattting and saves the schema of the database; edited using the Data Abstract Schema Modeler, a program that is part of Data Abstract.

content: DASCHEMA files are used to generate databases that store the data used by RemObjects middle-tier applications.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
